p: Our previous data on the same tumor cellular models, demonstrated that the redox perturbation due to natural compounds led to inhibition of NF-κB, a transcriptional factor often constitutively activated in many type of cancers and an important target for antitumor therapy [ 11, 27]. It would be interesting to assess the chemical structure of the tentatively identified hydroxy-methyl-naphthoquinone. Further studies should be also necessary to confirm if the diterpenes and this hydroxy-methyl-naphthoquinone are NF-κB inhibitors in these cancer models and to evaluate their possible use as anticancer drugs.
